content: I've been trying to navigate the healthcare system since I received my asylum approval three months ago. I've been focusing on finding a primary care physician who speaks my native language, which has been a huge help. Now, I want to understand my options for health insurance. Can you tell me more about how the Refugee Medical Assistance program interacts with other health insurance options? For example, if I enroll in RMA, can I still apply for Medicaid or a Marketplace plan later on?
